mean_cn: n. 共享，恳谈，宗教团体，圣餐仪式
mean_en: a Christian ceremony in which bread is eaten and wine is drunk as a way of showing devotion to Jesus Christ
sentence: Communion is the Christian ceremony in which people eat bread and drink wine in memory of Christ's death.
sentence_trans: 在基督教仪式——圣餐仪式上，基督徒吃圣饼喝圣酒以纪念耶稣的牺牲。
word_etyma: com共同的 ＋ mun公共的 ＋ ion表名词 → communion共享；恳谈；宗教团体
